info.title: FluxConfigurationClient
info.description: Use these APIs to create Flux Configuration resources through ARM, for Kubernetes Clusters.

get.description: Gets details of the Flux Configuration.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Create a new Kubernetes Flux Configuration.

parameters.name: fluxConfiguration
parameters.description: Properties necessary to Create a FluxConfiguration.

200.description: Request received successfully for an existing resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Update an existing Kubernetes Flux Configuration.

parameters.name: fluxConfigurationPatch
parameters.description: Properties to Patch in an existing Flux Configuration.

202.description: Request received successfully, and the resource will be updated asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: This will delete the YAML file used to set up the Flux Configuration, thus stopping future sync from the source repo.

parameters.name: forceDelete
parameters.description: Delete the extension resource in Azure - not the normal asynchronous delete.

200.description: OK.  The request has been completed successfully.

202.description: Accepted.  The request has been accepted for processing.

204.description: No Content.  The request has been accepted but the configuration was not found.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

ScopeDefinition.description: Scope at which the configuration will be installed.

SourceKindDefinition.description: Source Kind to pull the configuration data from.

GitRepositoryDefinition.description: Parameters to reconcile to the GitRepository source kind type.

url.description: The URL to sync for the flux configuration git repository.

timeoutInSeconds.description: The maximum time to attempt to reconcile the cluster git repository source with the remote.

syncIntervalInSeconds.description: The interval at which to re-reconcile the cluster git repository source with the remote.

repositoryRef.description: The source reference for the GitRepository object.

sshKnownHosts.description: Base64-encoded known_hosts value containing public SSH keys required to access private git repositories over SSH

httpsUser.description: Plaintext HTTPS username used to access private git repositories over HTTPS

httpsCACert.description: Base64-encoded HTTPS certificate authority contents used to access git private git repositories over HTTPS

localAuthRef.description: Name of a local secret on the Kubernetes cluster to use as the authentication secret rather than the managed or user-provided configuration secrets.

GitRepositoryPatchDefinition.description: Parameters to reconcile to the GitRepository source kind type.

url.description: The URL to sync for the flux configuration git repository.

timeoutInSeconds.description: The maximum time to attempt to reconcile the cluster git repository source with the remote.

syncIntervalInSeconds.description: The interval at which to re-reconcile the cluster git repository source with the remote.

repositoryRef.description: The source reference for the GitRepository object.

sshKnownHosts.description: Base64-encoded known_hosts value containing public SSH keys required to access private git repositories over SSH

httpsUser.description: Plaintext HTTPS username used to access private git repositories over HTTPS

httpsCACert.description: Base64-encoded HTTPS certificate authority contents used to access git private git repositories over HTTPS

localAuthRef.description: Name of a local secret on the Kubernetes cluster to use as the authentication secret rather than the managed or user-provided configuration secrets.

RepositoryRefDefinition.description: The source reference for the GitRepository object.

branch.description: The git repository branch name to checkout.

tag.description: The git repository tag name to checkout. This takes precedence over branch.

semver.description: The semver range used to match against git repository tags. This takes precedence over tag.

commit.description: The commit SHA to checkout. This value must be combined with the branch name to be valid. This takes precedence over semver.

BucketDefinition.description: Parameters to reconcile to the GitRepository source kind type.

url.description: The URL to sync for the flux configuration S3 bucket.

bucketName.description: The bucket name to sync from the url endpoint for the flux configuration.

insecure.description: Specify whether to use insecure communication when puling data from the S3 bucket.

timeoutInSeconds.description: The maximum time to attempt to reconcile the cluster git repository source with the remote.

syncIntervalInSeconds.description: The interval at which to re-reconcile the cluster git repository source with the remote.

accessKey.description: Plaintext access key used to securely access the S3 bucket

localAuthRef.description: Name of a local secret on the Kubernetes cluster to use as the authentication secret rather than the managed or user-provided configuration secrets.

BucketPatchDefinition.description: Parameters to reconcile to the GitRepository source kind type.

url.description: The URL to sync for the flux configuration S3 bucket.

bucketName.description: The bucket name to sync from the url endpoint for the flux configuration.

insecure.description: Specify whether to use insecure communication when puling data from the S3 bucket.

timeoutInSeconds.description: The maximum time to attempt to reconcile the cluster git repository source with the remote.

syncIntervalInSeconds.description: The interval at which to re-reconcile the cluster git repository source with the remote.

accessKey.description: Plaintext access key used to securely access the S3 bucket

localAuthRef.description: Name of a local secret on the Kubernetes cluster to use as the authentication secret rather than the managed or user-provided configuration secrets.

KustomizationDefinition.description: The Kustomization defining how to reconcile the artifact pulled by the source type on the cluster.

name.description: Name of the Kustomization, matching the key in the Kustomizations object map.

path.description: The path in the source reference to reconcile on the cluster.

dependsOn.description: Specifies other Kustomizations that this Kustomization depends on. This Kustomization will not reconcile until all dependencies have completed their reconciliation.

timeoutInSeconds.description: The maximum time to attempt to reconcile the Kustomization on the cluster.

syncIntervalInSeconds.description: The interval at which to re-reconcile the Kustomization on the cluster.

retryIntervalInSeconds.description: The interval at which to re-reconcile the Kustomization on the cluster in the event of failure on reconciliation.

prune.description: Enable/disable garbage collections of Kubernetes objects created by this Kustomization.

force.description: Enable/disable re-creating Kubernetes resources on the cluster when patching fails due to an immutable field change.

KustomizationPatchDefinition.description: The Kustomization defining how to reconcile the artifact pulled by the source type on the cluster.

path.description: The path in the source reference to reconcile on the cluster.

dependsOn.description: Specifies other Kustomizations that this Kustomization depends on. This Kustomization will not reconcile until all dependencies have completed their reconciliation.

timeoutInSeconds.description: The maximum time to attempt to reconcile the Kustomization on the cluster.

syncIntervalInSeconds.description: The interval at which to re-reconcile the Kustomization on the cluster.

retryIntervalInSeconds.description: The interval at which to re-reconcile the Kustomization on the cluster in the event of failure on reconciliation.

prune.description: Enable/disable garbage collections of Kubernetes objects created by this Kustomization.

force.description: Enable/disable re-creating Kubernetes resources on the cluster when patching fails due to an immutable field change.

KustomizationValidationDefinition.description: Specify whether to validate the Kubernetes objects referenced in the Kustomization before applying them to the cluster.

ObjectStatusDefinition.description: Statuses of objects deployed by the user-specified kustomizations from the git repository.

complianceState.description: Compliance state of the applied object showing whether the applied object has come into a ready state on the cluster.

appliedBy.description: Object reference to the Kustomization that applied this object

statusConditions.description: List of Kubernetes object status conditions present on the cluster

helmReleaseProperties.description: Additional properties that are provided from objects of the HelmRelease kind

ObjectReferenceDefinition.description: Object reference to a Kubernetes object on a cluster

lastTransitionTime.description: Last time this status condition has changed

message.description: A more verbose description of the object status condition

reason.description: Reason for the specified status condition type status

status.description: Status of the Kubernetes object condition type

type.description: Object status condition type for this object

lastRevisionApplied.description: The revision number of the last released object change

helmChartRef.description: The reference to the HelmChart object used as the source to this HelmRelease

failureCount.description: Total number of times that the HelmRelease failed to install or upgrade

installFailureCount.description: Number of times that the HelmRelease failed to install

upgradeFailureCount.description: Number of times that the HelmRelease failed to upgrade

FluxComplianceStateDefinition.description: Compliance state of the cluster object.

FluxConfiguration.description: The Flux Configuration object returned in Get & Put response.

properties.description: Properties to create a Flux Configuration resource

scope.description: Scope at which the operator will be installed.

namespace.description: The namespace to which this configuration is installed to. Maximum of 253 lower case alphanumeric characters, hyphen and period only.

sourceKind.description: Source Kind to pull the configuration data from.

suspend.description: Whether this configuration should suspend its reconciliation of its kustomizations and sources.

gitRepository.description: Parameters to reconcile to the GitRepository source kind type.

bucket.description: Parameters to reconcile to the Bucket source kind type.

kustomizations.description: Array of kustomizations used to reconcile the artifact pulled by the source type on the cluster.

configurationProtectedSettings.description: Key-value pairs of protected configuration settings for the configuration

statuses.description: Statuses of the Flux Kubernetes resources created by the fluxConfiguration or created by the managed objects provisioned by the fluxConfiguration.

repositoryPublicKey.description: Public Key associated with this fluxConfiguration (either generated within the cluster or provided by the user).

sourceSyncedCommitId.description: Branch and/or SHA of the source commit synced with the cluster.

sourceUpdatedAt.description: Datetime the fluxConfiguration synced its source on the cluster.

statusUpdatedAt.description: Datetime the fluxConfiguration synced its status on the cluster with Azure.

complianceState.description: Combined status of the Flux Kubernetes resources created by the fluxConfiguration or created by the managed objects.

provisioningState.description: Status of the creation of the fluxConfiguration.

errorMessage.description: Error message returned to the user in the case of provisioning failure.

FluxConfigurationPatch.description: The Flux Configuration Patch Request object.

properties.description: Updatable properties of an Flux Configuration Patch Request

sourceKind.description: Source Kind to pull the configuration data from.

suspend.description: Whether this configuration should suspend its reconciliation of its kustomizations and sources.

gitRepository.description: Parameters to reconcile to the GitRepository source kind type.

bucket.description: Parameters to reconcile to the Bucket source kind type.

kustomizations.description: Array of kustomizations used to reconcile the artifact pulled by the source type on the cluster.

configurationProtectedSettings.description: Key-value pairs of protected configuration settings for the configuration

FluxConfigurationsList.description: Result of the request to list Flux Configurations.  It contains a list of FluxConfiguration objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of Flux Configurations within a Kubernetes cluster.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of configuration objects, if any.
